name: Clams Kokkinisto
author: ICYREDD
summary: Inspired by my Greek mother-in-law's Kokkinisto. I decided to add clams for something different. Spoon over rice or angel hair pasta, sprinkle with crumbled feta cheese, and serve with crusty bread and white wine.
ingredients: 1 (28 ounce) can canned peeled and diced tomatoes
2 (7 ounce) cans whole baby clams, undrained
directions: In a large saucepan, saute the onion, celery, and garlic in 2 tablespoons olive oil until tender
Stir in tomatoes, tomato paste, and clams
Season with bay leaves, chili pepper flakes, oregano, and salt and pepper to taste
Cover, and simmer for 1 hour, until tomatoes begin to turn deep red in colour and the sauce thickens
Stir in remaining 2 tablespoons olive oil near the end of the cooking time
